channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-18561] Vectorization: Current vector PTF doesn't work under GroupBy and is designed for reduce-shuffle input
item.description: Need to add validation check in Vectorizer that doesn't vectorize unless PTF is under reduce-shuffle (with optional SELECT in-between).
item.summary: Vectorization: Current vector PTF doesn't work under GroupBy and is designed for reduce-shuffle input

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
